item.title: 日本电产发现更多可能存在不当会计的案例
item.description: 汽车制造商日本电产株式会社在一份延迟发布的年度证券报告中表示，该公司正要求第三方小组调查更多涉嫌不当会计的事件，这使日本科技冠军之一的日本电产又增添了一桩丑闻。【原文：Motor-maker Nidec Corp. said in a delayed annual securities report it was asking a third-party panel to look into additional suspected instances of improper accounting, adding to a scandal weighing on one of Japan’s tech champions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织资深人士承诺恢复对毛里求斯中央银行的信任
item.description: 在经历了数月的内部争论之后，毛里求斯首位女性央行行长发誓要重建人们对该机构的信心，并采取 "数据驱动 "的货币政策。【原文：Mauritius’s first female central bank governor vowed to rebuild confidence in the institution after it endured months of internal wrangling, and take a “data-driven” approach to monetary policy.】

item.title: 奇数：寻找下一个人工智能大突破（播客）

item.title: 欧洲央行称 8 月消费者通胀预期上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行表示，8月份欧元区消费者的通胀预期有所上升，支持了不再进一步降息的呼吁。【原文：Inflation expectations among euro-zone consumers increased in August, the European Central Bank said, backing calls to not lower interest rates further.】

item.title: 美联储鸽派押注解除，美元将迎来两个月来最佳一周
item.description: 美元将迎来 8 月初以来最强劲的一周，因为富有弹性的美国数据迫使交易商重新评估美联储的降息空间，并将注意力转向周五的通胀报告。【原文：The dollar is set for its strongest week since early August as resilient US data forced traders to reassess the Federal Reserve’s scope for interest-rate cuts, with attention turning to Friday’s inflation report.】

item.title: 一旦库尔德输油管道出口重启，维托尔公司将洽谈伊拉克石油销售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，伊拉克正在与维多集团（Vitol Group）谈判，一旦该国库尔德地区的原油出口在停止两年后恢复，维多集团将负责原油销售。【原文：Iraq is in talks with Vitol Group to handle crude sales once exports resume from the country’s Kurdish region after a two-year halt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯阿菲普斯基炼油厂在乌克兰无人机袭击后起火
item.description: 由于乌克兰继续打击敌人的能源基础设施，加剧了燃料短缺，俄罗斯南部的阿菲普斯基炼油厂一夜之间起火。【原文：The Afipsky refinery in southern Russia caught fire overnight as Ukraine continues to strike its enemy’s energy infrastructure, exacerbating fuel shortages.】

item.title: 据说 Blackstone 对跨马尔代夫航空公司的竞购已告吹
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 回购水上飞机运营商 Trans Maldivian Airways Pvt.【原文：A bid by Blackstone Inc. to repurchase seaplane operator Trans Maldivian Airways Pvt. has fallen through, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 埃克森公司大幅招聘，将伦敦能源交易业务增加一倍
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司在过去两年中将在英国工作的交易员人数增加了一倍，因为该公司正在推进从其庞大的全球能源基础设施中赚取更多利润的计划。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. has doubled the number of traders working in the UK over the past two years, as the major presses ahead with plans to make more money from its vast worldwide energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 美国石油流向亚洲面临油轮费昂贵的压力
item.description: 对亚洲买家来说，来自美国的原油可能会变得过于昂贵，原因是油轮运价上涨，而中国购买量的增加和贸易商对欧佩克+供应增加的定位又抬高了油轮运价。【原文：Crude from the US could become too expensive for Asian buyers due to higher tankers rates, which have been inflated by an increase in Chinese purchases and traders positioning for more OPEC+ supply.】

item.title: 欧洲股市上涨，投资者对特朗普的关税计划避而不谈
item.description: 由于投资者对唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁对专利药品征收关税不为所动，欧洲股市上涨。【原文：European stocks gained as investors were unmoved by President Donald Trump’s threats to slap tariffs on patented drugs.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁凸显制药商在美国工厂的进步
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对品牌药和专利药征收100%的关税，这可能会大幅提高没有美国制造能力的制药公司的成本，给尚未破土动工的公司带来更大压力。【原文：President Donald Trump’s plan to impose a 100% tariff on branded and patented drugs could sharply raise costs for pharmaceutical companies without US manufacturing capacity, raising pressure on firms that have yet to break ground.】

item.title: 诺巴银行首次亮相股价大涨，为斯德哥尔摩赢得最新胜利
item.description: 金融服务公司诺巴银行集团（Noba Bank Group AB）的股票在斯德哥尔摩首次公开发行时大涨，标志着在 Verisure Plc 公司大举上市之前，欧洲今年首次公开发行股票的最主要地点受到了推动。【原文：Shares of financial services firm Noba Bank Group AB surged in their Stockholm debut, marking a boost for Europe’s top venue for initial public offerings this year ahead of a blockbuster listing by Verisure Plc.】

item.title: 西班牙第二季度经济增长超预期
item.description: 西班牙经济在第二季度的增长超过了最初的报告，巩固了其在该地区的突出表现。【原文：The Spanish economy expanded more than initially reported in the second quarter, cementing its standout performance in the region.】

item.title: 南非同意银行修改信贷法的要求
item.description: 南非将继续修改信贷法，使向小型企业贷款更加容易，这是对曾批评政府撤回计划的顶级银行业游说团体呼吁的回应。【原文：South Africa will press ahead with changes to its credit laws to make lending to smaller firms easier, heeding a call by the top banking lobby group that had criticized the government’s withdrawal of the plans.】

item.title: 最高法院维持 JSW 22 亿美元的布山电力收购案
item.description: 印度最高法院在复审了先前驳回该交易的判决后，维持了 JSW 钢铁有限公司以 1,970 亿卢比（22 亿美元）收购负债累累的竞争对手 Bhushan Power & Steel Ltd. 的交易。【原文：India’s top court affirmed JSW Steel Ltd.’s 197 billion rupees ($2.2 billion) acquisition of debt-laden rival Bhushan Power & Steel Ltd., after reviewing its earlier judgment quashing the deal.】

item.title: 自动驾驶公司 Momenta 寻求价值 50 亿美元以上的融资
item.description: 自动驾驶初创公司 Momenta 正寻求以远高于 50 亿美元的估值筹集新资金，这意味着这家优步（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Autonomous driving startup Momenta is seeking to raise new funding at a valuation well above $5 billion, representing a major jump in the value of the Chinese partner to Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普在 "结论性 "会晤中就俄罗斯石油问题向埃尔多安施压
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统敦促土耳其限制从俄罗斯进口能源，并警告说美国向北大西洋公约组织盟国出售隐形战斗机取决于安卡拉对美国目标的支持。【原文：President Donald Trump urged Turkey to curb energy imports from Russia, warning that US sales of stealth fighter jets to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization ally depend on Ankara’s support for American goals.】

item.title: KKR 支持的 Advanta 据称将利用银行进行 5 亿美元的印度 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.支持的Advanta Enterprises Ltd.已聘请四家银行安排这家印度种子生产商的首次公开募股，募集资金可能达到 5 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co.-backed Advanta Enterprises Ltd. has hired four banks to arrange an initial public offering of the Indian seeds producer, which could raise $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊藤忠酝酿五年来首次发行美元纸币以实现多元化
item.description: 伊藤忠商事株式会社正准备发行高达 500 亿日元（约合 3.34 亿美元）的日元债券，同时还在考虑发行美元票据，这将是该公司五年来首次发行美元票据，有可能使本财年的发行总额超过 1000 亿日元。【原文：Itochu Corp. is preparing to issue up to 50 billion yen ($334 million) in yen bonds and is also weighing dollar notes for the first time in about five years, potentially bringing total issuance this fiscal year to more than 100 billion yen.】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的烟草黑市引发澳大利亚的打击行动
item.description: 澳大利亚卫生部长马克-巴特勒（Mark Butler）周五表示，澳大利亚正面临着烟草黑市的爆炸性增长，这已成为该国最大的公共健康威胁，他警告说，政府计划进行大规模打击，以起诉违法者。【原文：Australia is facing an explosion in the tobacco black market that’s now the country’s biggest public-health threat, Health Minister Mark Butler said Friday, warning the government plans a major crackdown to prosecute offenders.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：美国加征新关税，英国股市有望上涨
香港在北京敦促下通过禁止 "笼屋 "法案
item.description: 香港立法者通过了一项法案，逐步淘汰不符合标准的小型住宅单位，以响应北京改善城市居住条件的号召。【原文：Hong Kong’s lawmakers have passed a bill to phase out substandard tiny residential units, as the government moves to address Beijing’s call to improve the city’s living conditions.】

item.title: Prosus 旗下公司 OLX 将以 13 亿美元收购法国汽车交易商
item.description: Prosus NV 旗下的 OLX Group BV 将以 11 亿欧元（13 亿美元）的价格收购法国在线汽车交易商 La Centrale，以将其业务扩展到西欧。【原文：Prosus NV-owned OLX Group BV is buying French online auto trader La Centrale for €1.1 billion ($1.3 billion) to expand its business into Western Europe.】

item.title: 工党大会将笼罩在债券市场的阴影之下
item.description: 下周，当执政党工党的政治家和党员们齐聚一堂参加年度会议时，还有一个重要的受众需要考虑：英国债券市场。【原文：When the ruling Labour Party’s politicians and members gather for their annual conference next week, there will be another crucial audience to think about: the UK bond market.】

item.title: 赞比亚因贷款纠纷面临非洲进出口银行仲裁
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，非洲进出口银行正就债务减免纠纷对赞比亚提起仲裁，此举可能为其他国家寻求重组无力偿还的贷款开创先例。【原文：African Export-Import Bank is pursuing arbitration against Zambia in a dispute over debt relief, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that may set a precedent for other nations seeking to restructure loans they can’t afford.】

item.title: 紫金矿业香港股价大涨，溢价率再创新高
item.description: 紫金矿业集团股份有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Co.【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co.’s Hong Kong-listed shares are trading near a record premium over those in the mainland, as foreign investors rush to buy the stock of a company enjoying a boom period for gold.】

item.title: 在美国交易中，TikTok 业务价值堪比无聊蓝筹股
item.description: 对 TikTok 美国业务提出的 140 亿美元的标价，更像是对一家老旧的能源或食品公司的估值，而不是对一家全球领先的社交媒体公司的估值。【原文：The $14 billion price tag proposed for TikTok’s US business values it more like a stuffy old energy or food company than a leading global social media company.】

item.title: 美联储降息前景不明，新兴市场资产受关税新政影响下滑
item.description: 由于美国新一轮关税（包括对品牌或专利药品征收 100%的关税）打击了市场情绪，新兴市场资产下跌，而强劲的美国数据给美联储降息的前景蒙上了阴影，帮助美元守住了涨幅。【原文：Emerging-market assets dropped as the fresh round of US tariffs including a 100% duty on branded or patented pharmaceuticals hurt sentiment while strong American data clouded the view on Fed rate cuts, helping the dollar hold onto gains.】
